name: Portfolio Website
description: This project is the one you are viewing right now, created using Astro, React and TailwindCSS.

name: Steel Hawks Rest API Server
description: This project was created during the 2023-2024 season of the Steel Hawks. It is a REST API server that provides data for the scouting subteam to use. This is directly connected to the Steel Hawks Scout App.

name: Steel Hawks Scout App
description: This project was created during the 2023-2024 season of the Steel Hawks. It is a mobile app for Android and iOS and is written in React Native. It is used by the scouting subteam to collect data on other teams during competitions.

name: The Road Not Taken
description: This project was created for my 10th grade end of year English class. It is a video game made in Unity that is based on the poem 'Hope is the thing with feathers' by Emily Dickinson.
